hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NUM_OF_CORES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Decide how many cores for build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: script_to_init_qemu
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: /scratch/maxh/private_FUSDK/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/1.0-r1/recipe-sysroot-native/usr/bin/qemu-system-riscv64 --nographic -M sifive_u -kernel /scratch/maxh/private_FUSDK/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/qemuriscv64/Image-initramfs-qemuriscv64.bin -cpu rv64,x-b=true,x-v=true,vlen=256,elen=64,vext_spec=v1.0,Zvamo=true,x-Zfh=true -m 4G -smp 4 -append ' ip=dhcp root=/dev/nbd0 rw nbdroot=10.0.2.2:qemu01 port=10809 rw mem=2048M console=ttyS0 console=hvc0 earlycon=sbi ' -bios /scratch/maxh/private_FUSDK/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/qemuriscv64/fw_jump.elf

buildStep.command:
#!/bin/bash
# for debugging echo $NODE_NAME hostname build_date=`date +%m-%d-%Y` echo "build date = <$build_date>" echo "USER=$USER" echo "HOME=$HOME" echo "PWD=$PWD" echo "WORKSPACE=$WORKSPACE" echo "git config --global --list"
git config --global --replace-all url."git@github.com:".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/ git config --global --add url."git@github.com:".insteadOf git://git@github.com/
git config --global --list
# clear and reset folder if needed rm -rf /scratch/syssw/automation/jenkins workdir="/scratch/syssw/automation/jenkins" # workdir="/work/jenkins/meta_sifive_build/$FUSDK_MACHINE" mkdir -p $workdir chmod a+w -R $workdir cd $workdir
printenv
echo "check repo" mkdir ~/bin PATH=~/bin:$PATH curl https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo > ~/bin/repo chmod a+x ~/bin/repo
echo "load python3" module load python/python/3.8.1
echo "fallback check" if ! python3 -c 'import sys; assert sys.version_info >= (3,6)' > /dev/null; then echo "python load failed" export PATH=/sifive/tools/python/python/3.8.1/bin:$PATH python3 --version fi
# echo "clean old meta-sifive-private" # rm -rf .repo ./* ./build # rm -rf meta-sifive-private meta-clang meta-riscv meta-openembedded openembedded-core .repo
# clone FUSDK echo ${META_SIFIVE_PRIVATE_BRANCH} repo init -u git@github.com:sifive/meta-sifive-private -b $META_SIFIVE_PRIVATE_BRANCH -m $FUSDK_MANIFEST repo sync
# OpenEmbedded-Core requires GCC 6 or newer to be available on the host system, download the pre-built one ./openembedded-core/scripts/install-buildtools -r yocto-3.2_M2 -t 20200729 . ./openembedded-core/buildtools/environment-setup-x86_64-pokysdk-linux
# Setting up Build Environment . ./meta-sifive-private/setup.sh
##nbd-server port forwarding #ssh -v -N -L ${NBD_server_port}:localhost:${NBD_server_port} ${NBD_server_name} & #ssh_port_forwarding_pid=$! ##
cd ${workdir} git clone -b ${syssw_automation_tools_branch_name} git@github.com:sifive/syssw_automation_tools.git
##make nbd server cd ${workdir} wget https://sourceforge.net/projects/nbd/files/latest/download -O nbd-latest.tar.xz tar -xvf nbd-latest.tar.xz nbd_directory_name=`ls -d nbd-*` cd ${nbd_directory_name} ./configure make ./nbd-server -C ${workdir}/syssw_automation_tools/nbd-server-cfg/server.cfg & nbd_server_pid=$! ##
##make patchelf cd ${workdir} git clone git@github.com:NixOS/patchelf.git cd patchelf ./bootstrap.sh ./configure make ##
rm -rf $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE mkdir -p $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE
mkdir -p $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ mkdir -p $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/ cp -f $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/Image*.bin $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/fw*.elf $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/demo*.ext4 $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/demo*.conf $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -rf $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/qemu-native/ $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/ cp -rf $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/sysroots $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/
#tree $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/ mv $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/qemu-native/ $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/1.0-r1 mv $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/sysroots/ $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/sysroots-uninative/ #/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/1.0-r1/recipe-sysroot-native/usr/bin/qemu-system-riscv64
##run patchelf set -x qemu_interpreter=`${workdir}/patchelf/src/patchelf --print-interpreter ${workdir}/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/1.0-r1/recipe-sysroot-native/usr/bin/qemu-system-riscv64` qemu_new_interpreter=`echo ${qemu_interpreter} | sed "s/.*\(build.*\)/${workdir}\/\1/"` ${workdir}/patchelf/src/patchelf --set-interpreter ${qemu_new_interpreter} ${workdir}/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/1.0-r1/recipe-sysroot-native/usr/bin/qemu-system-riscv64 set +x ##
rm $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/test_env touch $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/test_env echo test_id: $BUILD_ID >> $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/test_env echo test_cases: $tests_to_run >> $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/test_env echo test_machine: $FUSDK_MACHINE >> $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/test_env
cd ${workdir}/syssw_automation_tools/automation_tests chmod 755 combine_tests.sh set -x ./combine_tests.sh result_of_combine_tests=$?
export qemu_config=`cat *_log | grep "runqemu - INFO - Running" | tail -1`
echo ${qemu_config} for i in ${WORKSPACE}/*.result do echo $i sed -i "0,/^/i ${qemu_config}" ${i} done
mkdir -p $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/test_results cp ${WORKSPACE}/*.result $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/test_results
##kill nbd server kill -9 ${ssh_port_forwarding_pid} ## rm -rf /scratch/syssw/automation/jenkins/
echo "overall situation: ${result_of_combine_tests}" exit ${result_of_combine_tests}
